bibl.title: Bacchylides. Politics, Performance, Poetic Tradition.
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 80 (2008), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 6.
bibl.seg: FEARN David, Bacchylides. Politics, Performance, Poetic Tradition.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2007, 8°, xii-428 pp. ISBN 0-19921550-2. £70.
Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 80 (2008), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 6.

C.R. par Dominique Arnould, REG 121 (2008) p. 407. - Giambattista D'Alessio, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2008/2008-11-14.html >. - Jan Stenger, CR N.S., 58 (2008) pp. 338-340. - Pascale Hummel, Gnomon 81 (2009) pp. 554-556. - Andreas Bagordo, Gymnasium 117 (2010) pp. 157-158.
